channel.title: Fixing the hoods d full helm and more
channel.description: ok when i put on like a d full helm or a skillhood it messes up for the hoods it shows alot of my hair and for the d full helm alot of my head is showing threw it can some 1 help me? :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2007, 11:34:33 PM[/size][hr]can any 1 plz help?

item.title: Fixing the hoods d full helm and more
item.dc:creator: @Jordonc2005 Jordonc2005
item.description:
@Jordonc2005 wrote:

[quote=“Steph., post:7, topic:138843”][quote author=iraklis123 link=topic=190786.msg1718427#msg1718427 date=1188565046]
putting the items in the right places e.g hats and fullmask or somthing like that is for dragon full helm it will make it sit perfect on your face
[/quote] You are a tard… Seriously go away

You don’t know squat[/quote]
i +1 that, irak, steph is right, that aint how u do it rofl…

right, say you want d full helm to look proper, edit the following to your item.java

public static int hats[] = {7652,rest-of-your-codes-are-here
public static int fullHelm[] = {7652,rest-of-your-codes-here

basically, u add the item code to both the hats and the fullHelm, and it makes it look real, if it was say…the slayer skillcape hood you wanted to look normal, it would be the following

public static int hats[] = {7654,
public static int fullHelm[] = {7654,

hope u understand

Read full topic
item.source: Fixing the hoods d full helm and more
